channel.title: Xbox Live problem - FIXED
channel.description:
Hey guys, Randomly my Xbox wont be able to connect to my router and its quite annoying when all I do on my xbox is go on live D:. My computer can connect to my router with ethernet and wireless just fine. My xbox is quite far away from my router but a lot of the time it can connect. I haven't been able to connect for like an hour now >.>, usually when it happens it lasts for like 5 mins. Anyone know what the problem is/how to fix it that isn't use an ethernet cable.
I have the new Star Wars 320Gb Xbox(shh, I wanted the normal one >.>)

item.title: Xbox Live problem - FIXED
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:10, topic:442201”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=544844.msg3996905#msg3996905 date=1337396512]

Bridge a connection from your Xbox to your PC.

Windows media center?

No.
http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc783728(v=ws.10).aspx

I don’t want to use cables to connect my PC to my Xbox but thanks though anyways.
[/quote]

All right. I use it since I have a computer 3 feet away from the xbox anyway. I thought you could use it.[/quote]
So do I:P, I literally swivel my swively chair around to go on my xbox haha;p. But I use my only ethernet port for my internet connection. Thanks though

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox Live problem - FIXED
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I have the new Star Wars 320Gb Xbox
The 2011/later xboxs have inbuilt wireless >.>. Its working now though, started fiddling with my router and it somehow worked, clearly wasn't anything to do with the router though cause I undid it and it still works. And + even though the xbox is far away it still is good enough to play with, without lag. Thanks though anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox Live problem - FIXED
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Well get a better antenna? Find ways to extend the signal.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox Live problem - FIXED
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Anyone know what the problem is/how to fix it that isn't use an ethernet cable
>.>^

My ethernet for my computer is like half dead cause of doors getting slammed on it and it makes my house look messy cause I just wrapped it around things, it has to go to a different floor so another ethernet just isn’t an option. Worst comes to worst I’ll take it back to game n get it sorted out there.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox Live problem - FIXED
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Insert cable into xbox, insert other end of cable into router TADA!

Read full topic
